Text: Seed Please, i cant find another crack to this game.

Fix to the missing audio.

STREAM - xxx - error

On my Win7 x64 bit system,

The registry key 'SrcDrive" located here:

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Electronic Arts\Need For Speed High Stakes\1.0

had to be changed to

CProgram Files (x86)\Electronic Arts\Need For Speed High Stakes\

Took me 3 hours to figure this out on my own. But there you go. Hope that helps some of you.
